release_notes.en-US: Fixes a bug introduced in 1.2.3 that left out certain types of server folders.  Local folders should now have flags available once again.  Also adds the latest SeaMonkey compatibility.

release_notes.en-US: This release moves the Flags option out of both the Edit menu and context menu and into a tab of the folder properties dialog.  This also adds Swedish and Simplified Chinese localizations thanks to translators from BabelZilla.

release_notes.de: Mit Version 1.2 enthält FolderFlags nun einen Eintrag im Menü "Bearbeiten" und überprüft nun korrekt, ob die Ordnerkategorien verändert werden können. Die Ordnerkategorie "Virtuell" wurde entfernt. Thunderbird 3 ist ab jetzt die einzige Hauptversion, welche unterstützt wird. Benutzer von Thunderbird 1.5 bis 2.x sollten FolderFlags 1.1.1 verwenden.
release_notes.pt-PT: O FolderFlags 1.2 agora inclui a opção do menu Editar e avalia de forma correcta se as etiquetas podem ser editadas. A etiqueta virtual foi removida.  O Thunderbird 3 é a única versão suportada pelo FolderFlags. Os utilizadores do Thunderbird 1.5 - 2.x devem usar o FolderFlags 1.1.1.
release_notes.en-US: FolderFlags 1.2 now includes an Edit menu option and correctly evalutes whether flags can be edited. The Virtual flag was removed.  Thunderbird 3 is now the only major version supported by FolderFlags.  Thunderbird 1.5 - 2.x users should use FolderFlags 1.1.1.
release_notes.it: FolderFlags 1.2 ora include un menu Modifica e valuta correttamente che i flag possano essere editati. Il flag Virtuale è stato rimosso. Thunderbird 3 è la versione principale supportata da FolderFlags 1.2. Gli utenti di Thunderbird 1.5 - 2.x dovrebbero usare FolderFlags 1.1.1
release_notes.pt-BR: O FolderFlags 1.2 inclui agora uma opção de menu Editar e avalia corretamente se atributos podem ser editados. O modo Virtual foi removido. O Thunderbird 3 é agora a única versão suportada pelo FolderFlags. Os usuários do Thunderbird 1.5 - 2.x devem usar o FolderFlags versão 1.1.1.
release_notes.cs: FolderFlags ve verzi 1.2 obsahuje položku v menu "Úpravy" a správně posuzuje, zda etikety mohou být upraveny. Byla odstraněna etiketa virtuální složky. Rozšíření FolderFlags podporuje především Thunderbird 3. Uživatelé Thunderbirdu 1.5 - 2.x by měli používat FolderFlags 1.1.1.

release_notes.en-US: Many thanks to Günter Gersdorf for assisting with adding Thunderbird 3.x.pre compatibility to FolderFlags and contributing to the German localization along with Martin Esfeld.  FolderFlags is still compatible with current 2.x official releases of Thunderbird.

With no bug reports since release, I'm happy to bump the version number to 1.0 to coincide with the next major release of Thunderbird.  There were no changes between the last release and this one except those required for installation metadata.  Feature requests based on new TB functionality are welcome.
Refreshes main window view of folders so flag changes show immediately.
Please send feedback.  Certain functions are missing, see the home page for a list of TODO's.
